topic.title: Teams
topic.p: A team is a part of an organization accumulating specific projects. Using teams, you can group users around dedicated projects in Qodana Cloud.

chapter.title: Create a team
chapter.p: During the onboarding stage, Qodana Cloud helps you create a team, so you need this step only for creating additional teams.

step.p: On the organization page, click Create team.
This will open the New team dialog.
In the New team dialog, specify the team name and click Create team.

chapter.title: Navigate teams
chapter.p: You can navigate to a team by clicking its name on an organization page, or its pictogram in the left sidebar.

chapter.title: Configure teams
chapter.p: To configure a team, click the upper-right corner of a team.
You can click Invite members to add new members to a team, configure user roles of the existing team members, or delete them.
